headline: L3Harris in the UK Achieves Silver ERS Award Status; L3Harris recently received Silver Award status under the Defence Employer Recognition Scheme (ERS).
summary: L3Harris' devotion to serving and supporting the U.K. Armed Forces began more than 100 years ago, and yet the business' commitment to this community still continues to grow and strengthen over a...
